resources.string: Please scroll and select which sources to include in your left-side menu. You can change your selections at any time through the right-side settings menu.
You can customize the appearance of articles in your feed. An example is displayed below based upon your selections. You can change your selections at any time through the right-side settings menu.

You can customize the appearance of articles in your feed. An example is displayed to the right based upon your selections. You can change your selections at any time through the right-side settings menu.
Town Council Passes New Property Tax Cuts

The Anytown Town Council has lowered property taxes in a 7-1 vote. Homeowners can expect to see a reduction up to 6%. Councilwoman Sheila Greene thanked residents and local organizations that advocated for the tax cuts to pass.
New Welding Plant Opens in South End

The long-awaited Harrison Welding Plant opened its doors for production today. The South End plant has created over 100 jobs for the community. A ribbon-cutting ceremony for the plant was attended by Anytown\'s mayor.
Family Holds Charity Fundraiser for Veterans

A local Anytown family held a charity event for veterans, raising over $10,000. The event, organized by the Wilkerson family and held at the Anytown High School auditorium, was attended by several hundred people from the community.
Snow Next Week? The Latest Weather Update
Weather update for Friday, December 18th, 2020: the Doppler 9000X+ is showing the possibility of snow Monday evening, lasting through Tuesday until the early morning hours of Wednesday.

Something not working correctly? Want to see a source included in this app? Have an idea for improvements? Enjoy using this app? I appreciate all feedback!\n\nPlease note that I cannot control the type and quantity of news items that appear for a source. The source\'s RSS feed determines which news items, and how many of them, are available at a given time.
Select the sources you want to appear in your list. They will appear in alphabetical order.
These options will affect the look of your news feed.
